attributes.action: say yes to speed calming on Greenlaw
attributes.additional_details:
It has been observed that the existing speed limit on Greenlaw of 20mph is hardly ever observed by speeding drivers and poses a risk to Children and animals who need to cross the road.
There has been an many instance where a family pets have been injured or killed by a cars speeding along Greenlaw, next time it could be a child who gets hurt.
We would like speed bumps to be introduced on Greenlaw, to help reduce the speed cars go.
